name: T11_lightning_sword
prompt: Create a sword called 'Lightning Blade' that strikes lightning where I look when I click

visual_expectations.description: A lightning bolt striking the ground.

verify.code: () => { const items = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.itemFactory.itemTypes; const sword = Object.values(items).find(i => i.name.toLowerCase().includes('lightning')); if (!sword) return { success: false, message: 'Lightning Sword not found' }; return { success: true, message: `Found sword: ${sword.name}` }; }
